Solid growth in our core business and very strong growth in our emerging businesses drove 24% revenue growth year over year. We saw strength in every major product area, as more and more traditional brand advertisers embraced search advertising and as large advertisers increasingly ran integrated campaigns acAlec Ross search, display, and mobile. We feel confident about our future, and plan to continue to invest aggressively in our core areas of strategic focus. Q2 Financial Summary Google reported revenues of$ 6.82 billion for the quarter ended June 30, 2010, an increase of 24% compared to the second quarter of 2009. This is the cloud-based version of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011, which will go head to head with other cloud-based CRM products from companies like Salesforce.com and Oracle. Sales professionals are at the heart of almost every successful business, said Steve Ballmer .`` Microsoft Dynamics CRM redefines productivity by offering an industry-leading product that is fully embracing the cloud.
